full_summary:
### Title
Landscaping and Grounds Maintenance Services for the Embassy of Canada in Algiers

### Reference Number
cb-614-92215947
Amendment Number: 2

### Solicitation Number
24-241755
Publication Date: April 18, 2024

### Tender Closing Date
May 17, 2024, 2:00 PM (EDT)
Last amendment date: May 17, 2024

### Procurement
The Embassy of Canada in Algiers invites service providers to bid on a Request for Proposal (RFP) for commercial landscaping and grounds maintenance services. The successful vendor will provide these services for the main diplomatic complex, located in Algiers, Algeria.

### Scope of Work
The scope of work includes providing landscaping and grounds maintenance services to the approximately 7-hectare property. The services will be carried out according to established rules, security standards, and safety measures in place to maintain the property with professionalism and care. The vendor must provide all necessary equipment, tools, materials, and supplies to perform the work, including transportation to and from the site.

### Scheduling and Timeline
There is no expected start or end date specified for this project. The tender has expired and will not be updated for this opportunity.

### Technical and Commercial Evaluation
The bid will be evaluated based on the Lowest Cost-per-Point criteria, ensuring the most cost-effective proposal will be considered for the contract. The potential bidders should consider this evaluation method when preparing their proposal.

### Market Engagement
This procurement opportunity is open to all qualified service providers, and interested parties are encouraged to clarify their eligibility and any other questions through contact with the procurement officer.

### Notice and Documents
You can access the tender documents on the official government procurement platform at the links provided:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36230/24-241755---rfp_0.pdf and
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36230/24-241755---addendum-1.pdf
Please find all additional information and supporting documents in these files.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement opportunity is open to all qualified vendors with whom Canada has a trade agreement in effect:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
